thread.title: This Swimsuit Cleans The Ocean As You Swim
thread.title_full: This Swimsuit Cleans The Ocean As You Swim

title: This Swimsuit Cleans The Ocean As You Swim
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Technology - Today 
California scientists have created an absorbent nanosponge material that can be sewn into swimwear and wet suits to soak up water pollution....
